column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Had a wonderful meal at Bavette's the other night. Loved Bavette's punch first off.  Eating highlights included the ribeye (definitely order the ribeye as it's so good)
column2: salmon tartare and the butter that came with the bread.  We weren't huge fans of the wedge salad as it had too much dill.  Overall
column3: wonderful meal. Loved the ambiance. Service was attentive.
